name: algebra
description: means completeness and balancing, from the Arabic word الجبر

scripts.build: npm test && npm run browserify && npm run minify && npm run jekyll; git status
scripts.browserify: npm run browserify:dist; npm run browserify:test
scripts.coverage: npm run istanbul && npm run coveralls
scripts.docs:_data: for x in package.json tags.json; do npm run docs:_data:$x; done
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > docs/index.md; cat README.md >> docs/index.md
scripts.jekyll: npm run homepage; npm run docs:_data; cd docs; jekyll build; cd ..
scripts.jekyll:serve: npm run browserify; npm run homepage; npm run cp; cd docs; jekyll serve; cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run lint_src; npm run lint_test
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; npm run push
scripts.postpublish: npm run docs:_data; git commit -am ':arrow_up: updated version'; npm run push
scripts.postupdate-deps: npm test && git commit -am ':arrow_up: updated deps' || git checkout -- package.json
scripts.pull: git pull origin master && npm run docs:pull
scripts.push: git push origin master && npm run docs:push
